alarm_set: This function can be used to set an alarm. You supply the alarm number from 0 to 11, and then the value to set the alarm to. The value must be an integer value, and you can set it to -1 to stop the alarm (non integer values will be rounded to the nearest integer). This is an alternative method to setting the alarm array directly.
The alarm index to set, from 0 to 11.
The value (an integer) to set the alarm to.

{ANY_CODE} for (var i = 0; i < 12; i++)
{nbsp_x3}{
{nbsp_x3}if alarm_get(i) > 0 alarm_set(i, -1);
{nbsp_x3}}
The above code checks all the alarms in the calling instance and if they are greater than 0 it sets them to -1, stopping them from counting down any further.
